scripts.db-handler:zip: cd db-handler && zip -r  db-handler.zip * -x *.ts utils/*.ts package-lock.json package.json   && cd ..
scripts.db-handler:update: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name db-handler --region eu-central-1 --zip-file fileb://db-handler/db-handler.zip --output text
scripts.db-handler:set-env-dev: aws lambda update-function-configuration --function-name db-handler --environment Variables={ORIGIN=http://localhost:3000} --output text
scripts.db-handler:version-dev: VERSION=$(aws lambda publish-version --function-name db-handler --description 'dev' --output text --query Version)
scripts.db-handler:version-prod: VERSION=$(aws lambda publish-version --function-name db-handler --description 'prod' --output text --query Version)
scripts.db-handler:deploy-dev: npm run db-handler:compile && npm run db-handler:zip && npm run db-handler:update && npm run  db-handler:set-env-dev && npm run db-handler:wait && npm run db-handler:version-dev && npm run db-handler:update-alias-dev
scripts.fix: npm run format && npm run sort-package-jsons
